home__description: Experienced in Robotics and Artificial Intelligence projects, committed to delivering quality results.
about__description: I have hands-on experience in robotic motion control, path planning, state estimation, and vision processing, and am proficient in machine learning, deep learning, and reinforcement learning. Currently, I focus on embodied intelligence to enable more autonomous and flexible perception and decision-making in next-generation (humanoid) robots, driving further innovation and real-world adoption of robotics technology.
portfolio1__description: This project is a multi-robot navigation system based on Ubuntu 18.04 using TurtleBot robots. By integrating sensor fusion and path planning, it enables collaborative localization and autonomous navigation in shared environments.
portfolio2__description: This project implements a multi-robot formation control system based on Model Predictive Control (MPC). By employing a leader-follower strategy, it ensures robust and stable group movement under dynamic conditions.
portfolio3__title: State Estimation for the ParCli Tripedal Climbing Robot
portfolio3__description: This project focuses on state estimation for the ParCli tripedal climbing robot. Using multi-sensor fusion and Extended Kalman Filter (EKF), it improves localization accuracy and motion stability, enabling reliable climbing and navigation in complex environments.
portfolio4__title: Reinforcement Learning Environment for Autonomous Driving Simulation
portfolio4__description: This project provides a simulation environment for autonomous driving research using reinforcement learning. It enables testing and training of decision-making algorithms in a controlled environment, facilitating the development of intelligent driving policies.
portfolio5__description: This project focuses on soil moisture estimation using multi-sensor fusion techniques. By integrating data from multiple sensors, it enhances measurement accuracy and reliability, providing real-time soil moisture analysis for environmental monitoring and precision agriculture.
